S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānda utthāyāsamādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - viprasannāni tava bhagavata indriyāṇi,

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_5: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan jāmbūnadasuvarṇaniṣko dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa karmārāntevāsinā vā ulkāmukhena saṃpraveśya supariniṣṭhitaḥ (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_6: Vaidya 222) pāṇḍukambala uparinikṣipto 'tīva pariśuddho bhavati paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāsaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_9: na khalu punarahaṃ bhagavan abhijānāmi itaḥ pūrvataramevaṃ viprasannāni tathāgatasyendriyāṇi evaṃ poariśuddhaṃ mukhavarṇaṃ paryavadātaṃ chavivarṇaṃ pītanirbhāsam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_10: tasya me bhagavan evaṃ bhavati - buddhavihāreṇa batādya tathāgato vihārati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_16: utāho buddhā bhagavntaḥ? atha tena pratyutpannamīmāṃsājñānenaivaṃ prajānāsīti? evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavan devatā etamarthamārocayanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_17: nāpi buddhā bhagavantaḥ / atha tarhi me bhagavaṃstenaiva pratyātmamīmāṃsājñānenaivaṃ bhavati - buddhavihāreṇādya tathāgato viharati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_21: udāraḥ khalu te unmiñjaḥ,bhadrikā mīmāṃsā,kalyāṇaṃ pratibhānam / bahujanahitāya tvamānanda pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyayārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_23: evameva bhagavatsu ānandastathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu aprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu jñānadarśanamupasaṃharet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_26: jñānamākāṅkṣannānanda tathāgataḥ ekapiṇḍapātena kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpaśataṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_27: tato vottari tiṣṭhet, na ca tathāgatasyendriyāṇyupanaśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_30: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi ānanda tathāgataḥ samādhimukhapāramitāprāptaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_32: tadyathā audumbarapuṣpāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvaḥ sudurlabho bhavati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_33: evameva ānanda tathāgatānāmarthakāmānāṃ hitaiṣīṇāmanukampakānāṃ mahākaruṇāpratipannānāṃ sudurlabhaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_34: api tu khalvānanda tathāgatasyaiva so 'nubhāvo yastvaṃ sarvalokācāryāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmarthāya tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_35: tena hyānanda śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_2_36: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / evaṃ bhagavan ityāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_0: bhagavānānandametadavocat - bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvani ito 'saṃkhyeye kalpe 'saṃkhyeyatare vipule 'prameye 'cintye yadāsīt /

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_14: puṣpākaro nāma, udakacandro nāma, avidyāndhakāravidhvaṃśanakaro nāma,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_20: candrabhānurnāma, candraprabho nāma, vimalanetro nāma, girirājaghoṣośvaro nāma, kusumaprabho nāma, kusumavṛṣṭyabhiprakīrṇo nāma,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_21: ratnacandro nāma, padmabimbyupaśobhito nāma, candanagandho nāma, ratnābhibhāso nāma nimirnāma,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_22: mahāvyūho nāma, vyapagatakhiladoṣo nāma, bramhaghoṣo nāma, saptaratnābhivṛṣṭo nāma, mahāguṇadharo nāma, mahātamālapatracandanakardamo nāma,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_3_23: kusukābhijño nāma, ajñānavidhvaṃsano nāma, kesarī nāma, muktacchatro nāma, suvarṇagarbho nāma, vaiḍūryagarbho nāma, mahāketurnāma, dharmaketurnāma, ratnaketurnāma, ratnaśrīrnāma, kolendro nāma, narendro nāma, kāruṇiko nāma, lokasundaro nāma, bramhaketurnāma, dharmaketurnāma, siṃho nāmasiṃhamatirnāma / siṃhamaterānanda pareṇa parataraṃ lokeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /

S04bsu033_u:10_0: atha khalvānanda sa dharmākaro bhikṣurutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāsau bhagavāṃllokeśvararājastathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya tasminneva samaye saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt -

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_1_1: sūryamaṇigirīśacandraābhā na tapita bhosiṣu ebhi sarvaloke //

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_4_1: tatha ahu buddha bhavi dharmasvāmī jaramaraṇātprajāṃ pramocayeyam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_5_1: ebhi ahu vratāṃ samādadāmi buddha bhaviṣyami sarvasattvatrātā //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_6_0: buddhaśatasahasra koṭyanekā yathariva vālika gaṅgayā anantā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_6_1: sarvata ahu pūjayiṣya nāthāṃ śivavarabodhigaveṣako atulyāṃ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_7_1: sarvatra prabha muñcayiṣya tatrā iti etādṛśa vīryamārabhidhya //

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_9_1: buddha mama pramāṇu atra śikṣī avitathavīryabalaṃ janemi chandam //

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_1: atha khalvānanda sa dharmākaro bhikṣustaṃ bhagavantaṃ lokeśvararājaṃ tathāgataṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya etadavocat - ahamasmi bhagavan uttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_3: tasya me bhagavān śāstā tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_6: tāṃśca bhagavānākārān parikīrtayatu yairahaṃ buddhakṣetrasya guṇavyūhasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_7: evamukte ānanda bhagavāṃllokeśvararājastathāgatastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ bhikṣo svayameva buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇīṣva /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_9: api tu bhagavāneva / bhāṣasva anyeṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṃkārasaṃpadam,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_10: yāṃ śrutvā vayaṃ sarvākāraṃ paripūrayiṣyāma iti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_5_11: athānanda sa lokeśvararājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasya bhikṣurāśayaṃ jñātvā paripūrṇāṃ varṣakoṭīmekāśītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadaṃ sākārāṃ soddeśāṃ sanirdeśāṃ saṃprakāśitavānarthakāmo hitaiṣī anukampako 'nukampāmupādāya buddhakṣetrānupacchedāya sattveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayitvā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_6_2: tāḥ sarvā eke buddhakṣetre parigṛhya bhagavato lokeśvararājasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavato 'ntikātprākrāmat /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_6_3: uttari ca pañca kalpān buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadamudāratarāṃ praṇītatarāṃ ca sarvaloke daśasu dikṣu apracaritapūrvāṃ parigṛhītavān,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_0: iti hyānanda yā tena bhagavatā lokeśvararājena tathāgatena teṣāmekāśītibuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ saṃpattiḥ kathitā,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_1: tato bhikṣurekāśītyudārapraṇītāprameyatarāṃ buddhakṣetrasaṃpattiṃ parigṛhya yena sa tathāgatastenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā etadavocat - parigṛhītā me bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpaditi /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_2: evamukte ānanda sa lokeśvararājastathāgatastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - tena hi bhikṣo bhāṣasva,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_3: anumodate tathāgataḥ / ayaṃ kālo bhikṣo, pramodaya parṣadam, harṣaṃ janaya, siṃhanādaṃ nada,yaṃ śrutvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā etarhyanāgate 'dhvani evaṃrūpāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇasaṃpattipraṇidhisthānāni parigrahīṣyanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_4: athānanda sa dharmākaro bhikṣustasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi śṛṇotu me bhagavān ye mama praṇidhānaviśeṣāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_7_5: yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya acintyaguṇālaṃkāravyūhasamanvāgataṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu033_u:20_0: 1. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre nirayo vā tiryagyonirvā pretaviṣayo vā āsuro vā kāyo bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:21_0: 2. sacenme bhagavaṃstasya tatra buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:21_1: te punastataścyutvā nirayaṃ vā tiryagyoniṃ vā pretaviṣayaṃ vā āsuraṃ vā kāyaṃ prapateyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:22_0: 3. sacenme bhagavaṃstatra buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāste ca sarve naikavarṇāḥ syuryadidaṃ suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:23_0: 4. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nānātvaṃ prajñāyeta anyatra nāma saṃvṛtivyavahāramātrā devamanuṣyā iti saṃkhyāgaṇanātaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:24_0: 5. sacenme bhagavaṃtasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:24_1: te ca sarve na ṛddhivaśitāparamapāramitāprāptā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:25_0: 6. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:25_1: te ca sarve jātismarā na syuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:26_0: 7. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājāyeran,
S04bsu033_u:26_1: te sarve na divyasya cakṣuṣo lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:27_0: 8. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājāyeran,
S04bsu033_u:27_1: te sarve na divyasya śrotrasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:28_0: 9. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājāyeran,
S04bsu033_u:29_0: 10. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājāyeran,
S04bsu033_u:30_0: 11. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājāyeran,
S04bsu033_u:30_1: te sarve na niyatāḥ syuryādidaṃ samyaktve yāvanmahāparinirvāṇe,
S04bsu033_u:31_0: 12. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya kaścitsattvaḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanāmadhigacchet,
S04bsu033_u:32_0: 13. sacenme bhagavaṃstasmin buddhakṣetre anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya pramāṇikī me prabhā bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:33_1: 14. sacenme bhagavannanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ pramāṇīkṛtamāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:35_0: 16. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvānāmakuśalasya nāmadheyamapi bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:36_0: 17. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya nāpramayeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayeyuḥ,
S04bsu033_u:36_1: na varṇaṃ bhāṣeran, na praśaṃsāmabhyudīrayeran, na samudīrayeyuḥ,mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam /
S04bsu033_u:37_0: 18. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya ye sattvā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā prasannacittā māmanusmareyuḥ,

S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_0: amitā cāsya prabhā yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇaparyantamadhigantum - iyanti buddhakṣetraśatāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_7: api tu khalu punarānanda saṃkṣiptena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tayā tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya prabhayā sadā sphuṭāni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_8: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsvadha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu ca ekaikasyāṃ diśi samantādgaṅgānadīvālukopamāni yāvadbuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_9: Vaidya 234) tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya prabhayā sadā parisphuṭāni sthāpayitvā buddhān bhagavataḥ pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena ye vyāmaprabhayā ekadvitricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanaprabhayā yojanaśataprabhayā yojanasahasraprabhayā yojanaśatasahasraprabhayā yāvadanekayojanakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhayā vā lokaṃ spharitvā tiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_10: nāstyānanda upamopanyāso yena śakyaṃ tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya prabhāyāḥ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_12: amitaprabho 'mitaprabhāso 'samāptaprabho 'saṃgataprabhaḥ prabhāśikhotsṛṣṭaprabhaḥ sadivyamaṇiprabho 'pratihataraśmirāgaprabho rājanīyaprabhaḥ premaṇīyaprabhaḥ pramodanīyaprabhaḥ saṃgamanīyaprabha upoṣaṇīyaprabho nibandhanīyaprabho 'tivīryaprabho 'tulyaprabho 'bhibhūyanarendrāmūnnayendraprabhaḥ(?) śrāntasaṃcayendusūryajihmīkaraṇaprabho 'bhibhūya lokapālaśakrabrahmaśuddhāvāsamaheśvarasarvadevajihmīkaraṇaprabha ityucyate /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_13: sā ca āryaprabhā vimalā vipulā kāyasukhasaṃjananī cittaudvilyakaraṇī devāsuranāgayakṣagandharvagaruḍamahoragakinnaramanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ prītiprāmodyasukhakaraṇī kuśalāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ kalyakuśalamimiṇevadviprāmodyakaraṇī(?) ye 'nyeṣvapyanantāparyanteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_14: anena cānanda paryāyeṇa tathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ bhāṣyet tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāma karmopādāya prabhāmārabhya,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_15: na ca śaknoti guṇaparyantamadhigantuṃ tasyāḥ prabhāyāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_12_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? ubhayamapyetadānanda aprameyamasaṃkhyeyamacintyāparyantaṃ yadidaṃ tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya prabhāguṇavibhūtiḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_0: tasya khalu punarānanda amitābhasya tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum - iyatyaḥ śrāvakakoṭyaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_1: iyanti śrāvakakoṭīśatāni, iyanti śrāvakakoṭīsahasrāṇi, iyanti śrāvakakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_2: iyanti kaṃkarāṇi, iyanti bimbarāṇi, iyanti nayutāni, iyantyayutāni, iyantyakṣobhyāṇi, iyanto vivāhāḥ, iyanti srotāṃsi, iyanti ojāṃsi, iyantyaprameyāṇi, iyantyasaṃkhyeyāni, iyantyagaṇyāni, iyantyatulyāni, iyantyacintyānīti / tadyathā ānanda bhikṣurmaudgalyāyana ṛddhivaśitāprāptaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_3: sa ākāṅkṣan trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau yāvanti tārārūpāṇi tāni sarvāṇyekarātridine nagareṇa gaṇayet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_5: te ca varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasramananyakarmaṇā amitābhasya tathāgatasya prathamaśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ gaṇayeyuḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_6: ebhirgaṇayadbhiḥ śatatamo 'pi bhāgo na gaṇito bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_8: yāvatkalāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na gaṇito bhavet /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_9: tadyathā ānanda mahāsamudrāccaturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyāvedhena tiryagaprameyāt kaścideva puruṣaḥ śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā ekamudakabindumabhyutkṣipet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_10: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda katamo 'tra bahutaraḥ - yo vā śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣipta eka udakabinduḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_11: yo vā mahāsamudre 'psakandho 'vaśisṭa iti? ānanda āha - yojanasahasramapi tāvadbhagavan mahāsamudrasya parīttaṃ bhavet kimaṅga punaḥ śatadhā bhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyā (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_17: evamagaṇitaṃ draṣṭavyam / kaḥ punarvādo dvitīyatṛtīyādīnāṃ śrāvakasaṃnipātānām /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_13_18: evamanantāparyantastasya bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeya ityeva saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_14_0: aparimitaṃ ca ānanda tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamadhigantum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_14_1: iyanti vā kalpaśatāni, iyanti vā kalpasahasrāṇi, iyanti vā kalpaśatasahasrāaṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_14_2: iyatyo vā kalpakoṭyaḥ, iyanti vā kalpakoṭīśatāni, iyanti vā kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_14_5: atha tarhi ānanda aparimitameva tasya bhagavat āyuḥpramāṇamaparyantam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_14_8: tathā sāṃprataṃ daśa kalpāstasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasyotpannasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_15_0: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhāturṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā ca bahudevamanuṣyākīrṇā ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_15_1: tatra khalvānanda lokadhātau na nirayāḥ santi na tiryagyonirna pretaviṣayo nāsurāḥ kāyā nākṣaṇopapattayaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_15_2: na ca tāni ratnāni loke pracaranti yāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau vidyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_0: sā khalvānanda sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ surabhinānāgandhasamīritā nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhā ratnavṛkṣasamalaṃkṛtā tathāgatābhinirmitamanojñasvaranānādvijasaṃghaniṣevitā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_1: te cānanda ratnavṛkṣā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_9: santi kecid dvayo ratnayoḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_10: santi trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_11: santi caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_12: santi pañcānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_13: santi ṣaṇṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya lohitamuktāyāśca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_14: santi saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya lohitamuktāyā aśmagarbhasya ca saptamasya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_16: phalāni rūpyamayāṇi / rūpyamayāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ rūpyamayānyeva mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpatrapuṣpāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_17: phalāni vaiḍūryamayāṇi / vaiḍūryamayāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṇi mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpatrapuṣpāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_18: phalāni sphaṭikamayāni / sphaṭikamayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sphaṭikamayānyeva mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpatrapuṣpāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_24: phalāni ca suvarṇamayāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ suvarṇamayāni mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_25: rūpyamayāḥ skandhāḥ, vaiḍūryamayā viṭapāḥ, sphaṭikamayāḥ śākhāḥ, musāragalvamayāni patrāṇi, lohitamuktāmayāni puṣpāṇi, aśmagarbhamayāṇi phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ rūpyamayāṇi mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_26: vaiḍūryamayāḥ skandhāḥ, sphaṭikamayā viṭapāḥ, musāragalvamayāḥ śākhāḥ, lohitamuktāmayāni patrāṇi, aśmagarbhamayāṇi puṣpāṇi, suvarṇamayāni phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṇi mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_27: sphaṭikamayāḥ skandhāḥ, musāragalvamayā viṭapāḥ, lohitamuktāmayāḥ śākhāḥ, aśmagarbhamayāṇi patrāṇi, suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi, rūpyamayāṇi phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ sphaṭikamayāni mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_28: musāragalvamayāḥ skandhāḥ, lohitamuktāmayā viṭapāḥ, aśmagarbhamayāḥ śākhāḥ, suvarṇamayāni patrāṇi, rūpyamayāṇi puṣpāṇi, vaiḍūryamayāṇi phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ musāragalvamayāni mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_29: lohitamuktāmayāḥ skandhāḥ, aśmagarbhamayā viṭapāḥ, suvarṇamayāḥ śākhāḥ, rūpyamayāṇi patrāṇi, vaiḍūryamayāṇi puṣpāṇi, sphaṭikamayāni phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ lohitamuktāmayāni mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_30: aśmagarbhamayāḥ skandhāḥ, suvarṇamayā viṭapāḥ, rūpyamayāḥ śākhāḥ, vaiḍūryamayāṇi patrāṇi, sphaṭikamayāni puṣpāṇi, musāragalvamayāṇi phalānikeṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāmaśmagarbhamayāṇi mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_31: suvarṇamayāḥ skandhāḥ, rūpyamayā viṭapāḥ, vaiḍūryamayāḥ śākhāḥ, sphaṭikamayāni patrāṇi, musāragalvamayāni puṣpāṇi, lohitamuktāmayāni phalāni / keṣāṃcidānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ saptaratnamayāni mūlāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_32: saptaratnamayāḥ skandhāḥ, saptaratnamayā viṭapāḥ, saptaratnamayāḥ śākhāḥ, saptaratnamayāni patrāṇi, saptaratnamayāni puṣpāṇi, saptaratnamayāni phalāni / sarveṣāṃ cānanda teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpatrapuṣpaphalāni sukhasaṃsparśāni sugandhīni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_33: vātena preritena ca teṣāṃ valgumanojñaghoṣo niścaratyasecanako 'pratikūlaḥ śravaṇāya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_34: evaṃrūpairānanda saptaratnamayairvṛkṣaiḥ saṃtataṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ samantācca kadalīskandhaiḥ saptaratnamayai ratnatālapaṅktibhiścānuparikṣiptaṃ sarvataśca hemajālapraticchannaṃ samantaśca sarvaratnamayaiḥ padmaiḥ saṃchannam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_40: yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_16_41: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu dikṣu adha ūrdhvamanuvidikṣu gatāvaraṇe loke 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn gatiṃ gattvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_1: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśaḥ kālaparvatā na santi sarvato ratnaparvatāḥ sarvaśaḥ sumeravaḥ parvatarājāḥ sarvaśaścakravālā mahācakravālāḥ parvatarājāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_2: samantācca tadbuddhakṣetraṃ samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ pāṇitalajātaṃ nānāvidharatnamaṇicitabhūmibhāgam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_3: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - ye ca punaste bhagavaṃścāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ sumerupārśvanivāsinastrāyastriṃśā vā sumerumūrdhni nivāsinaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_4: te kutra pratiṣṭhitāḥ? bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ānanda ye te iha sumeroḥ parvatarājasyopari yāmā devāstuṣitā vā nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmakāyikā vā brahmapurohitā vā mahābrahmāṇo va yāvadakaniṣṭhā vā,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_5: kutra te pratiṣṭhitā iti / ānanda āha - acintyo bhagavan karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ karmābhisaṃskāraḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_6: bhagavānāha - labdhastvayānanda ihācintyaḥ karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ karmābhisaṃskāro na buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacintyaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtapuṇyānāṃ ca sattvānāmavaropitakuśalamūlānām /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_7: tavācintyā puṇyā vibhūtiḥ / ānanda āha - na me 'tra bhagavan kācitkāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_17_8: api tu khalvahamanāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimativicikitsānirghātāya tathāgatametadarthaṃ paripṛcchāmi /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_0: tasyāṃ khalvānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nānāprakārā nadyaḥ pracaranti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_3: sarvāśca tā nadyaḥ sukhavāhinyo nānāsurabhigandhavārivāhinyo nānāratnalulitapuṣpasaṃghātavāhinyo nānāmadhurasvaranirghoṣāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_4: tāsāṃ cānanda koṭiśatasahasrāṅgasaṃprayuktasya divyasaṃgītisamūrcchitasya tūryasya kuśalaiḥ saṃpravāditasya tāvanmanojñaghoṣo niścarati yathārūpastāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ nirghoṣo niścarati gambhīro 'jñeyo 'vijñeyo 'nelaḥ karṇasukho hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyo valgurmanojño 'secanako 'pratikūlaḥ śravaṇāya,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_5: anityaṃ śāntamanātmeti sukhaśravanīyo yasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrotrendriyābhāsamāgacchati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_6: tāsāṃ khalu punarānanda mahānadīnāmubhayatastīrāṇi nānāgandharatnavṛkṣaiḥ saṃtatāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_8: tatra ye sattvāsteṣu nadītīreṣvākāṅkṣanti divyābhirāmaramaṇīyāṃ ratikrīḍāṃ cānubhavitum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_9: teṣāṃ tatra nadīṣvavatīrṇānāmākāṅkṣatāṃ gulphamātraṃ vāri saṃtiṣṭhate /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_13: tatra ye sattvā ākāṅkṣanti śītaṃ vāri bhavatviti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_14: teṣāṃ śītaṃ vāri bhavati / ya ākāṅkṣanyuṣṇaṃ bhavatviti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_15: teṣāmuṣṇaṃ bhavati / ya ākāṅkṣanti śītoṣṇaṃ bhavatviti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_17: tāśca mahānadyo divyatamālapatrāgarukālānusāritagaroragasāracandanavaragandhavāsitavāriparipūrṇāḥ pravahanti divyotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaugandhikādipuṣpasaṃchannā haṃsasārasakrauñcacakravākakāraṇḍavaśukaśārikakokilakuṇālakalaviṅkamayūrādimanojña - svarāstathāgatābhinirmitapakṣisaṃghaniṣevitapulinā dhārtarāṣṭropaśobhitāḥ sūpatīrthā vikardamāḥ suvarṇavālukāsaṃkirṇāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_18: tatra yadā te sattvā ākāṅkṣanti kīdṛśā (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_21: yaścāsāvānanda tasya vāriṇo nirghoṣaḥ sa manojño niścarati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_23: ye ca sattvā nadītīreṣu sthitā ākāṅkṣanti mā asmākamayaṃ śabdaḥ śrotrendriyāvabhāsamāgacchatviti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_27: tadyathā - buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ pāramitāśabdaṃ bhūmiśabdaṃ balaśabdaṃ vaiśāradyaśabdamāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdaṃ pratisaṃvicchabdaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirodhaśabdaṃ śāntapraśāntopaśāntaṃ mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāmahāmuditāmahopekṣāśabdamanutpattikadharmakṣāntyabhiṣekabhūmipratilambhaśabdam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_28: śrutvā udāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabhate vivekasahagataṃ virāgasahagataṃ śāntasahagataṃ nirodhasahagataṃ dharmasahagataṃ bodhipariniṣpattikuśalamūlasahagataṃ ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_31: sarvaśo duḥkhaśabdo nāsti / aduḥkhāsukhavedanāśabdo 'pi tāvadānanda tatra nāsti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_32: kutaḥ punarduḥkhaśabdo bhaviṣyati? tadanena ānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_33: na punarvistareṇa kalpo 'pyānanda parikṣayaṃ gacchetsukhāvatyā lokadhātoḥ sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_18_34: na tveva śakyaṃ teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ paryantamadhigantum /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājaniṣyante,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_1: sarve te evaṃrūpeṇa varṇena balena sthāmnā ārohapariṇāhena ādhipatyena puṇyasaṃcayena atiṣṇabhirvastrābharaṇodyānavimānakūṭāgāraparibhogairevaṃrūpaśabdagandharasasparśaparibhogaiḥ evaṃrūpaiśca sarvairapi bhogaparibhogaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_3: na khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sattvā audārikayūṣaphāṇitākārāhāramāharanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_7: na teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ kāye prakṣepaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_8: te prīṇitakāyāstathārūpāṇi gandhajātānyākāṅkṣanti - īddaśaireva gandhajātairdivyaistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sarvameva nirdhūpitaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_10: tasya sarvaśo gandharvarājño vāsanā na samudācarati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_12: teṣāṃ tathārūpaiśca taiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_14: teṣāṃ tādṛśaireva cīvararatnaiḥ sarvaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_17: tadyathā - śīrṣābharaṇāni vā karṇābharaṇāni vā grīvābharaṇāni vā hastapādābharaṇāni vā yadidaṃ mukuṭāni kuṇḍalāni kaṭakakeyūrāṇi vatsahārā rūcakahārā karṇikā mudrikāḥ svarṇasūtrāṇi mekhalāḥ svarṇasūtāṇi jālāni muktājālāni sarvaratnajālāni svarṇaratnakiṅkiṇījālāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_21: te yādṛśaṃ vimānamākāṅkṣanti yadvarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ yāvadārohapariṇāhaṃ nānāratnamayaniryūhaśatasahasrasamalaṃkṛtaṃ nānādivyapuṣpasaṃstīrṇaṃ citropadhānavinyastaparyaṅkam,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_19_23: teṣu manonirvṛtteṣu vimāneṣu saptasaptāsparasahasraparivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā viharanti krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_20_0: na ca tatra lokadhātau devānāṃ vā manuṣyāṇāṃ vā nānātvamasti anyatra saṃvṛtivyavahāreṇa devamanuṣyāviti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_20_1: tadyathā ānanda rājñaścakravartinaḥ purato manuṣyahīno manuṣyapretako na bhāsate na tapate na virocate,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_20_2: na ca bhavati viśārado na prabhāśvaraḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_20_3: evameva devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ purataḥ śakro devānāmindro na bhāsate na tapate na virocate yadidamudyānavimānavastrābharaṇairādhipatyena ṛddhyā vā prātihāryeṇa vā aiśvaryeṇa vā ānanda,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāhṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite samantāccaturdiśamākulāḥ samākulā vāyavo vānti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_1: teṣāṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ citrān darśanīyān nānāvarṇānanekavṛntān nānāsurabhidivyagandhaparivāsitān kṣobhayanti saṃkṣobhayanti īrayanti samīrayanti yato bahūni puṣpaśatāni tasyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ prapatanti manojñagandhāni darśanīyāni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_3: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṣpasaṃstaraṃ saṃstṛṇuyāt,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_5: evameva tadbuddhakṣetraṃ taiḥ puṣpairnānāgandhavarṇaiḥ samantātsaptapauruṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_6: tāni ca puṣpajātāni mṛdūni kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśāni aupamyamātreṇa,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_9: nirgate punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye tāni puṣpāṇi niravaśeṣamantardhīyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_10: athe tadbuddhakṣetraṃ viviktaṃ ramyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavatyaparikliṣṭaiḥ pūrvapuṣpaiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_13: yathā pūrvāhṇe, evaṃ madhyāhnakālasamaye saṃdhyāyāṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme madhyame yāme paścime yāme /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_21_14: taiśca vātairvāyadbhirnānāgandhaparivāsitaiste sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma nirodhasamāpanno bhikṣuḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_22_0: tasmiścānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśo 'gnisūryacandragrahanakṣatratārārūpāṇāṃ tamondhakārasya nāmadheyaprajñapraptirapi nāsti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_22_1: sarvaśo rātriṃdivaṃ prajñaptirapi nāsti anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_23_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle divyagandhodakameghā abhipravarṣayanti divyāni sarvavarṇikāni kusumāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_23_1: divyāni saptaratnāni, divyaṃ candanacūrṇam, divyāśchatradhvajapatākā abhipravarṣayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_24_0: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvā upapannā utpadyante utpasyante,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_24_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti tatra dvayo rāśyorvyavasthānaṃ prajñaptirvā yadidamaniyatasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_24_3: tadanenāpyānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_24_4: na punarvistareṇa / kalpo 'pyānanda parikṣīyeta sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_24_5: na ca teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ śakyaṃ paryantamadhigantum /
S04bsu033_u:100_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_23_1: te kalpakoṭīmatha vāpi cottariṃ sukhāvatīvarṇa prakāśayeyuḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_24_0: kṣaye kalpakoṭī vajre surāśca sukhāvatīye na ca varṇasāruḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_24_1: kṣayaṃ na gacchetpratibhā ca teṣāṃ prakāśayantāna tu varṇa nānāṃ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_25_0: ye lokadhātū paramāṇusādṛśāṃśchidyeya bhidyeya rajaśca kuryāt /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_25_1: ato bahū uttari lokadhātu pūreta dānaṃ ratanāhi dadyāt //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_26_0: naitā kalāpi upamāpi tasya puṇyasya bhontī pṛthulokadhātavaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_26_1: ye lokadhātūya sukhāvatīye śrutvaiva nāmaṃ bhavatīha puṇyam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_27_0: tato bahū puṇya bhaveta teṣāṃ ye śraddhate jinavacanaṃ saprajñāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_27_1: śraddhā hi mūlaṃ jagatasya prāptaye tasmāddhi śrutvā vicitiṃ vinodayet //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_26_0: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_26_1: Vaidya 241) parikīrtayante, varṇaṃ bhāṣante, yaśaḥ prakāśayanti, guṇamudīrayanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? ye kecitsattvāstasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_27_0: ye cānanda kecitsattvāstaṃ tathāgataṃ punaḥ satkāramanasikariṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_27_3: teṣāṃ so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite 'nekabhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_27_4: tataste taṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittāścyutāḥ santastatraiva sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_27_5: yaśca ānanda ākāṅkṣeta kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kimityahaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyeyamiti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_27_6: tenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya adhyāśayātiśayatayā saṃtatyā tasmin buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣya upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayitavyāni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_28_0: ye punastaṃ tathāgataṃ na bhūyo manasikariṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_28_2: teṣāṃ tādṛśenaiva so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho varṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhena bhikṣusaṃghaparivāreṇa ca tādṛśa eva buddhinirmito maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_28_3: te tenaiva tathāgatadarśanaprasādālambanena samādhinā apramuṣitayā smṛtyā cyutāstatraiva buddhakṣetre pratyājaniṣyanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_29_2: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu tuṣṭiṃ pratilapsyante,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_29_3: na vipatsyante,na viṣādamāpatsyante,na saṃsadanamāpatsyante, antaśa ekacittotpādenāpi taṃ tathāgataṃ manasikariṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_30_0: imaṃ khalvānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya tathāgatā daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmagheyaṃ parikīrtayanto varṇaṃ ghoṣayantaḥ saṃpraśaṃsāmabhyudīrayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_30_1: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvāstamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramanti darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_30_2: taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃśca buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadviśeṣān draṣṭum /
S04bsu033_u:114_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā paridīpayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_29_0: bahupuṣpapūṭī gṛhītva te nānāvarṇaṃ surabhī manoramāṃ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_30_0: tatha dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu buddhāna kṣetrā daśatāsu yāttakāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_30_1: yato yato āgami buddha vandituṃ sabodhisattvā amitāyunāyakam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_32_0: pūjitva vā te bahubodhisattvā vanditva pādāmamitaprabhasya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_32_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vadanti caivaṃ aho 'dbhutaṃ śobhati buddhakṣetram //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_33_0: te puṣpapūṭīhi punokiranti udagracittā atulāya prītiye /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_33_1: kāmaṃ prabhāṣanti purasta nāyake asmāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_34_0: ye puṣpapūṭā iti kṣipta tatra chatraṃtayā saṃsthihi yojanāśatam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_34_1: svalaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati citraravato chādante buddhasya samanta kāyam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_35_0: te bodhisattvā tathā satkaritvā kathaṃ karontī iti tuṣṭa tatra /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_35_1: sulabdha lābhāḥ khalu tehi sattvaiḥ yehī śrutaṃ nāma narottamasya //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_36_0: asmehi pī lābha sulabdhapūrvā yadā gatāsya ima buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_36_1: paśyātha svapnopama maitra kīdṛśaṃ yatkalpitaṃ kalpasahasra śāstuḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_37_0: paśyātha buddhā vara puṇyarāśiḥ parivṛto śobhati bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_37_1: amitābhasya ābhā amitā ca tejā amitaṃ ca āyūramitaśca saṃghaḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_38_1: ye niścaritvā mukhamaṇḍalātaḥ sphūranti kṣetrāṇi sahasrakoṭīḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_39_0: tāḥ sarvasūrīḥ punaretya tatra mūrdhe ca astaṃ gami nāyakasya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_39_1: devā manuṣyā janayanti prītiṃ arcistadā asyamidāṃ viditvā //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_40_0: uttiṣṭhate buddhasuto mahāyaśā nātha so hi avalokiteśvaraḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_40_1: ko heturatra bhagavaṃ kaḥ pratyayo yena smitaṃ kurvasi lokanātha //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_41_0: taṃ vyākarohī yatra so 'rthakovido hitānukampī bahusattvamocakaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_41_1: śrutveti vācaṃ paramāṃ manoramāṃ udagracittā bhaviṣyanti sattvāḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_42_0: ye bodhisattvā bahulokadhātutaḥ sukhāvatīṃ prasthita buddha paśyatāṃ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_42_1: te śrutvā prītiṃ vipulāṃ janetvā kṣipramimaṃ kṣetra vilokayeyuḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_43_0: āgatya ca kṣetramidaṃ udāraṃ ṛddhībalaṃ prāpuṇi kṣiprameva /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_43_1: divyaṃ ca cakṣustatha śrotra divyaṃ jātismarāḥ pāramikovidāśca //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_44_0: amitāyu buddhastada vyākaroti mama hyayaṃ praṇidhi babhūva pūrvam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_44_1: kathaṃ pi sattvā śruṇiyāni nāma vrajeyu kṣetraṃ mama nityameva //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_45_0: sa me ayaṃ praṇidhi prapūrṇa śobhanā sattvāśca ebhi bahulokadhātutaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_45_1: āgatya kṣipraṃ mama antikasmiṃ avaivartikā bhontiha ekajātiyā //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_46_0: tasmādya icchatiha bodhisattvaḥ mamāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_46_1: ahaṃ pi sattvān bahu mocayeyaṃ nāmena ghoṣeṇa tha darśanena //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_47_0: sa śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchatu lokadhātum /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_47_1: gattvā ca pūrvamamitaprabhasya pūjetu buddhāna sahasrakoṭīḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_48_0: buddhāna koṭī bahu pūjayitvā ṛddhībalena bahu kṣetra gattvā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_48_1: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ sugatāna santike bhaktyā gamiṣyanti sukhāvatītaḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_31_0: buddhāna koṭī bahu pūjayitvā ṛddhībalena bahu kṣetra gattvā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_31_1: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ sugatāna santike bhaktyā gamiṣyanti sukhāvatītaḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_0: tasya khalu punarānanda amitāyuṣastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhivṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_2: aṣṭau yojanaśatānyabhipralambitaśākhāpatrapalāśaḥ pañcayojanaśatamūlārohapariṇāhaḥ sadāpatraḥ sadāpuṣpaḥ sadāphalo nānāvarṇo 'nekaśatasahasravarṇo nānāpatro nānāpuṣpo nānāphalo nānāvicitrabhūṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaścandrabhāsamaṇiratnaparisphuṭaḥ śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnavicitritaścintāmaṇiratnākīrṇaḥ sāgaravaramaṇiratnasuvicitrito divyasamatikrāntaḥ svarṇasūtrābhipralambito rucakahāraratnahāravatsahārakaṭakahāralohitamuktāhāranīlamuktāhārasiṃhalatāmekhalākalāparatnasūtrasarva-ratnavastuśatābhivicitritaḥ svarṇajālamuktājālasarvaratnajālakiṅkiṇījālatato makarasvastikanandyāvartacandrasamalaṃkṛtaḥ kiṅkiṇīmaṇijālasauvarṇasarvaratnālaṃkāravibhūṣito yathāśayasattvavijñaptisamalaṃkṛtaśca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_3: tasya khalu punarānanda bodhivṛkṣasya vātasamīritasya yaḥ śabdo ghoṣo niścarati so 'parimāṇāṃllokadhātūn vijñāpayati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_4: tatrānanda yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sa bodhivṛkṣaḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgacchati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_8: ye khalu punarānanda sattvāstato bodhivṛkṣādgandhaṃ jighranti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_9: teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu ghrāṇaroagaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_11: teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu jihvārogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_13: Vaidya 245) bhavanti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu kāyarogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_14: ye ca khalu punarānanda sattvāstaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ dharmato nidhyāyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_15: teṣāṃ tata upādāya yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu cittavikṣepaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_16: sarve ca te sattvāḥ sahadarśanāttasya bodhivṛkṣasyāvaivartikāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante yadutānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_32_17: tisraśca kṣāntīḥ pratilabhante yadidaṃ ghoṣānugāmanulomikīmanutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ ca tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena pūrvajinakṛtādhikāratayā pūrvapraṇidhānaparicaryayā ca susamāpyayā subhāvitayānūnāvikalatayā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_33_0: tatraiva khalu punarānanda ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyante pratyājaniṣyante vā,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_33_1: sarve te ekajātipratibaddhāstata evānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante sthāpayitvā praṇidhānavaśaṃ ye te bodhisattvā mahāsiṃhanādanādina udārasaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ sarvasattvaparinirvāṇābhiyuktāśca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_34_0: tasmina khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye śrāvakānte vyāmaprabhāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_34_2: sthāpayitvā dvau bodhisattvau yayoḥ prabhayā sā lokadhātuḥ satatasamitaṃ nityāvabhāsasphuṭā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_34_3: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmadheyau bhagavaṃstau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau? bhagavānāha - ekastayorānanda avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dvitīyo mahāsthāmaprāpto nāma /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_34_4: ita eva cānanda buddhakṣetrāccyutā tau tatropapannau /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_35_0: tatra cānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_35_1: sarve te dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇasamanvāgatāḥ paripūrṇagātrā dhyānābhijñākovidāḥ prajñāprabhedakuśalāstīkṣṇendriyāḥ susaṃvṛtendriyā ājñātāvīndriyā adīnābalendriyāḥ pratilambhakṣāntikā anantāparyantaguṇāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_36_0: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvā pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_36_2: sarve te tata upādāya na jātu jātismarā bhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā tathārūpeṣu kalpasaṃkṣobheṣu ye pūrvasthānapraṇihitāḥ pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu vartamāneṣu yadā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_0: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_1: sarve te ekapurobhaktenānyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā anekāni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupatiṣṭhanti yāvadākāṅkṣanti buddhānubhāvena /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_2: te yathā yathā cittamutpādayanti evamevaṃrūpaiḥ puṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantītūryasaṃgītivādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāma iti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_3: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādāttathārūpāṇi ca sarvapūjāvidhānāni pāṇau prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_4: te taiḥ puṣpairyāvadvādyaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu pūjāṃ kurvanto bahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamupacinvanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_6: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādānnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā nānāgandhā divyāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_7: te taistathārūpaiḥ puṣpapuṭaistān buddhān bhagavato 'vakiranti abhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_9: Vaidya 246) utsṛṣṭaḥ sa daśayojanavistaraṃ puṣpacchatraṃ prādurbhavati uparyantarīkṣe /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_10: dvitīye cānutsṛṣṭe na prathamo dharaṇyāṃ prapatati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_11: santi tatra puṣpapuṭā ya utsṛṣṭāḥ santo viṃśatiyojanavistārāṇi puṣpacchatrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_37_16: te bahvaparimitamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropya bahūni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupasthāya ekapūrvāhṇena punarapi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pratiṣṭhante tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānaparigraheṇa pūrvadattadharmaśravaṇena pūrvajināvaropitakuśalamūlatayā pūrvapraṇidhānasamṛddhiparipūryātmabhūtayā suvibhaktabhāvitayā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_0: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_2: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ kācitparigrahasaṃjñāsti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_3: te sarve ca tadbuddhakṣetramanucaṃkramamāṇā anuvicaranto na ratiṃ nāratimutpādayanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_4: prakrāmantaścānapekṣāḥ, na ca prakrāmanti sāpekṣāḥ / sarvasattveṣāmeva cittaṃ nāsti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_5: tatra khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_6: nāsti teṣāmanyatamakasaṃjñā, nāsti svakasaṃjñā, nāstyasamasaṃjñā, nāsti vigrahaḥ,nāsti vivādaḥ,nāsti virodhaḥ / samacittā maitracittā mṛducittāḥ snigdhacittāḥ karmaṇyacittāḥ prasannacittāḥ sthiracittā vinīvaraṇacittā akṣubhitacittā alulitacittāḥ prajñāpāramitācaryācaraṇacittāścittādhārabuddhipraviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_7: sāgarasamāḥ prajñayā,merusamā buddhyā, anekaguṇasaṃnicayāḥ, bodhyaṅgasaṃgītyā vikrīḍitāḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_9: divyaṃ cakṣurabhinirharanti, prajñācakṣurgatiṃgatā dharmacakṣuḥpāragatā buddhacakṣurniṣpādayanto darśayanto dyotayanto vistareṇa prakāśayanto 'saṅgajñānamabhinirharanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_10: traidhātukasamatāyāmabhiyuktā dāntacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ sarvadharmadhātūpalabdhisamanvāgatāḥ samudayaniruktikuśalā dharmaniruktisamanvāgatā hārāhārakuśalā nayānayakuśalāḥ sthānakuśalā laukikīṣu kathāsvanapekṣā viharanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_12: sarvadharmaparyeṣṭikuśalāḥ sarvadharmaprakṛtivyupaśamajñānavihāriṇo 'nupalambhagocarā niṣkiṃcanā nirupādānā niścintā nirupadhayo 'nupādāya suvimuktā anaṅgaṇā aparyasthāyino 'bhijñāsu amūlasthāyino 'saṅgācārikā anavalīnā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā na saṃsīdanti dūranubodhabuddhajñānapraveśodgatā ekāyanamārgānuprāptā nirvicikitsāstīrṇakathaṃkathā aparapratyayajñānā anadhimāninaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_13: sumerusamā jñānābhyudgatāḥ / sāgarasamā buddhyakṣobhyāḥ / candrasūryaprabhātikrāntāḥ prajñābhayā pāṇḍarasuśuklaśuddhaśubhacittatayā ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_38: vaiḍūryasadṛśāḥ śīlena / ratnākarāḥ śrutena / mañjusvarā mahādharmadundubhinirghoṣeṇa /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_39: mahādharmabherīṃ parāghnanto mahādharmaśaṅkhamāpūrayanto mahādharmadhvajamucchrāpayanto dharmolkāṃ prajvālayantaḥ prajñāvilokino 'saṃmūḍhā nirdoṣāḥ śāntakhilāḥ śuddhā nirāmagandhā alubdhāḥ saṃvibhāgaratā muktatyāgāḥ prasṛtapāṇayo dānasaṃvibhāgaratā dharmāmiṣābhyāṃ dāne 'matsariṇo 'saṃsṛṣṭā urtrastamānasā viraktā dhīrā dhaureyā dhṛtimanto hrīmantaḥ suvyūḍhasattvā nirgāḍhāḥ prāptābhijñāḥ suratāḥ sukhasaṃvāsā arthakarā lokapradyotā nāpadāgantuṃ dhīrā rāgaṃ tamaḥ pranekasvaṣṭhaḥ(?) śokāpagatā nirmalā nimeṣaprahīṇā vikrīḍitābhijñā hetubalikāḥ praṇidhānabalikā ajihmā akuṭilā ete lakṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā utpāṭitamānaśalyā apagatarāgadveṣamohāḥ śuddhāḥ śuddhādhimuktā jinabalapraśastā lokapaṇḍitā uttaptajñānasamudāgatā jinasutāścittaudbilyasamanvāgatāḥ śūrā dṛḍhā amamā akhilā atulā arajaskāḥ sahitā udārā ṛṣabhā hrīmanto dhṛtimantaḥ smṛtimanto matimanto gatimantaḥ prajñāśastrapraharaṇā puṇyavanto dyutimanto vyapagatakhilā malaprahīṇāḥ smṛtiyuktāḥ śāntajñānālambhāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_40: īdṛśā ānanda tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_38_44: tatkasya hetoḥ? ubhayamapyeva ānanda acintyamatulyaṃ yadidaṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ guṇāstathāgatasya cānuttaraprajñāpratibhānam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_0: api cānanda uttiṣṭha, paścānmukhībhūtvā puṣpāvakīrṇāñjalīṃ pragṛhya praṇipata /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_1: eṣā sā dig yatra sa bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_2: dharmaṃ ca deśayati virajo viśuddhaṃ yasya tannāmadheyamanāvaraṇe daśadiśi loke vighuṣṭam ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti stuvanti praśaṃsantyasakṛdasakṛdasaṅgavācāprativākyāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_3: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - icchāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstamamitābhamamitaprabhamamitāyuṣaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_6: Vaidya 248) vāk, atha tāvadeva so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svapāṇitalāttathārūpaṃ raśmiṃ prāmuñcadyadidaṃ koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_7: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvatra koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ ye kecitkālaparvatā vā ratnaparvatā vā merumahāmerumucilindamahāmucilindacakravālamahācakravālā vā citayo vā stambhā vā vṛkṣagahanodyānavimānāni divyamanuṣyakāṇi,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_8: tāni sarvāṇi tasya tathāgatasya tayā prabhayābhinirbhinnānyabhūvan samabhibhūtāni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_9: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo vyāmamātrake 'nvito dvitīyaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyavekṣedāditye 'bhyudgate,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_10: evamevāsmin buddhakṣetre bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmadrākṣustamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sumerumiva parvatarājaṃ sarvakṣetrābhyudgataṃ sarvā diśo 'bhibhūya bhāsamānaṃ tapantaṃ virocamānaṃ vibhrājamānam,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_11: taṃ ca mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ yadidaṃ buddhānubhāvena tasyāḥ prabhāyāḥ pariśuddhatvāt /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_13: tatra na vṛkṣā na parvatā na dvīpā na tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo na nadīśvabhraprapātāḥ prajñāpayeran,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_15: evameva tasmin buddhakṣetre nāstyanyatkiṃcilliṅgaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā anyatraiva vyāmaprabhāḥ śrāvakāste ca yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhā bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_16: sa ca bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇamabhibhūya sarvā diśaḥ prabhāsayan saṃdṛśyate /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_39_17: tena khalvapi samayena tasyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakadevamanuṣyāśca sarve te imāḥ sahālokadhātuṃ śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamarhatā bhikṣusaṃghena parivṛtaṃ paśyanti sma dharmaṃ deśayantam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_0: tatra khalu bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - paśyasi tvamajita amuṣmina buddhakṣetre guṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadam? upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe ārāmaramaṇīyānyudyānaramaṇīyāni nadīpuṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni nānāratnapadmotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkākīrṇāni? adhastācca dharaṇītalamupādāya yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanādgaganatalaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇaṃ puṣpāvalisamupaśobhitaṃ nānāratnastambapaṅktiparisphuṭaṃ tathāgatābhinirmitanānādvijasaṃghaniṣevitam? ajito bodhisattva āha - paśyāmi bhagavan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_1: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita etānamarān dvijasaṃghān sarvabuddhakṣetraṃ buddhasvareṇābhivijñāpayantaṃ yenaite bodhisattvā nityamavirahitā buddhānusmṛtyā? ajita āha - paśyāmi bhagavan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_2: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita atra buddhakṣetre 'mūn sattvān yojanaśatasahasrikeṣu vimāneṣvabhirūḍhānantarīkṣe sasatkārān krāmantaḥ? ajita āha - paśyāmi bhagavan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_3: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita asti kiṃcinnānātvaṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāṇāṃ vā? ajita āha - ekamapyahaṃ bhagavan nānātvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yāvanmaharddhikā atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_4: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsam? āha - tadyathāpi nāma devāstrāyastriṃśā devā yāmā vā pañcāśadyojanikeṣu vā (Sukhv,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_5: Sukhv, Vaidya 249) yojanaśatikeṣu vā pañcayojanaśatikeṣu vā vimāneṣu praviṣṭāḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_40_6: evamevāhaṃ bhagavan atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsaṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_0: santi khalu punaratra bhagavan sattvā ya aupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_1: tatko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadanye garbhāvāsaṃ prativasanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_2: anye punaraupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti? bhagavānāha - ye te ajita bodhisattvā anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye vicikitsāmutpādayanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_5: ye punarnirvicikitsāmutpādya cchinnakāṅkṣāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_8: ye te ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anyatra buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāścittamutpādayanti amitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_9: na vicikitsāmutpādayanti, na kāṅkṣanti asaṅgaṃ buddhajñānam,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_11: teṣāmaupapādukānāṃ paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhūtānāṃ muhūrtamātreṇa evaṃrūpaḥ kāyo bhavati tadyathānyeṣāṃ ciropapannānāṃ sattvānām /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_12: paśya ajita prajñāviśeṣaṃ prajñāvaimātryaṃ prajñāparihāṇiṃ prajñāparīttatām - yattu hitāya pañcavarṣaśatāni parihīṇā bhavanti buddhadarśanādbodhisattvadarśanāddharmaśravaṇāddharmasaṃkathanāt /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_13: kuśalamūlacaryāyāḥ parihīṇā bhavanti sarvakuśalamūlasaṃpattibhiḥ yadidaṃ vicikitsāpatitaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_14: tadyathāpi nāma ajita rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya bandhanāgāraṃ bhavetsarvasauvarṇavaiḍūryapratyuptamavasaktapaṭṭamālyadāmakalāpaṃ nānāraṅgavibhavavitānaṃ dūṣyapaṭṭasaṃchannaṃ nānāpuṣpakusumābhikīrṇamudāradhūpanirdhūpitaṃ prāsādaharmyaniryūhagavākṣavedikātoraṇavicitraṃ saptaratnaṃ kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannaṃ caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ caturdvāraṃ catuḥsopānam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_15: tatra tasya sa rājñaḥ putraḥ kenacideva kṛtyena prakṣipya jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayairnigaḍairbaddho bhavati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_16: tasya ca tatra paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ syādanekagoṇikāstīrṇastūlikāparṇakāstīrṇaḥ kāliṅgaprāvaraṇapratyāstaraṇasottarapadacchada ubhayāntalohitopadhānaścitro darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_17: sa tatra tadābhiṣaṇṇo vā abhisaṃpanno vā bhavet /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_18: bahu cāsyānekavidhaṃ śuci vinītaṃ pānabhojanaṃ tatropanāmyeta /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_19: tatkiṃ manyase ajita udārastasya rājaputrasya sa paribhogo bhavet? ajita āha - udāro bhagavan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_20: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita api tvāsvādayettatra niśāmayecca,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_21: tena vā tuṣṭiṃ vidyāt?āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_22: api tu khalu punaryadyapanītya rājñā tatra bandhanāgāre prakṣipto bhavet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_23: sa tato mokṣamevākāṅkṣet / abhijātān kumārānamātyān stryāgārān śreṣṭhino gṛhapatīn koṭṭarājāṃśca paryeṣayet,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_25: kiṃcāpi bhagavaṃstasya rājakumārasya tatra bandhānāgāre nābhiratiḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_27: bhagavānāha - evameva ajita ye te bodhisattvā vicikitsāpatitāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_29: kiṃcāpi tena buddhanāmaśravaṇena tena ca cittaprasādamātreṇa atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyante,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_30: na tu khalvaupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_33: nāstyuccāraprasrāvam, nāsti kheṭasiṃhāṇakam, na pratikūlaṃ manasaḥ pravartate,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_34: api tu khalu punaḥ pañca varṣaśatāni virahitā bhavanti buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena bodhisattvadarśanena dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayena sarvakuśalamūlena dharmacaryābhiśca /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_35: kiṃcāpi te tatra nābhiramante na tuṣṭiṃ vijānanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_36: api tu khalu punaḥ pūrvāparān kṣapayitsate bhūyastataḥ paścānniskrāmanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_37: na caiṣāṃ tato niṣkrāmatāṃ niṣkramaḥ prajñāyate ūrdhvamadhastiryagvā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_38: paśya ajita etarhi nāma pañcabhirvarṣaśatairbahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasropasthānāni syurbahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitavyāni /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_40: paśya ajita kiyanmahate 'narthāya bodhisattvānāṃ vicikitsā saṃvartata iti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_41_41: tasmāttarhi ajita bodhisattvairnirvicikitsairbodhaye cittamutpādya kṣipraṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhānāya sāmarthyapratilambhārthaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_0: evamukte ajito bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvā ito buddhakṣetrātpariniṣpannā anyeṣāṃ vā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikātsukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante? bhagavānāha - ito hyajita buddhakṣetrād dvāsaptatikoṭīniyutāni bodhisattvānāṃ pariniṣpannāni yāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante pariniṣpannānāmavaivartikānāṃ bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyavaropitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_1: kaḥ punarvādastataḥ parīttataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ duṣprasahasya tathāgatasyāntikādaṣṭādaśakoṭīniyutaśatāni bodhisattvānāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_2: pūrvāntare digbhāge ratnākaro nāma tathāgato viharati /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_14: puṣpadhvajasya (Sukhv, Vaidya 251) tathāgatasyāntikātpañcaviṃśatirvīryaprāptā bodhisattvakoṭya ekaprasthānaprasthitā ekenāṣṭāhena navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paścānmukhīkṛtya sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_16: vaiśāradyaprāptasya tathāgatasyāntikādekonasaptatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante amitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripṛcchanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_42_17: etena ajita paryāyeṇa paripūrṇakalpakoṭīniyutaṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtayeyaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yebhyaste bodhisattvā upasaṃkrāmanti sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ draṣṭuṃ vanditu paryupāsitum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_0: paśya ajita kiyatsulabdhalābhāste sattvā ye 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_1: nāpi te sattvā hīnādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti ye 'ntaśaekacittaprasādamapi tasmiṃstathāgate 'bhilapyante,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_2: asmiṃśca dharmaparyāye / tasmāttarhi ajita ārocayāmi vaḥ,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_3: prativedayāmi sadevakasya lokasya purato 'sya dharmaparyāyasya śrāvaṇāya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_4: trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātumagnipūrṇamavagāhya atikramaikacittotpādamapi pratisāro na kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvakoṭyo hyajita aśravaṇādeṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_6: tasmādasya dharmaparyāyasyādhyāśayena śravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇārthaṃ paryāvāptaye vistareṇa saṃprakāśāya bhāvanārthaṃ ca sumahadvīryamārabdhavyam /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_7: antaśa ekarātriṃdinamapi, ekagodohamātramapi, antaśaḥ pustakāvaropitaṃ kṛtvā sulikhito dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_8: śāstṛsaṃjñā ca tatropādhyāye kartavyā ya icchati kṣipramaparimitān sattvānavaivartikatve 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_9: tacca tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭum,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_11: api tu khalu ajita atyarthaṃ sulabdhalābhāste sattvā avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā buddhādhiṣṭhitāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_12: yeṣāmanāgate 'dhvani yāvatsaddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpā udārā dharmaparyāyāḥ sarvabuddhasaṃvarṇitāḥ sarvabuddhapraśastāḥ sarvabuddhānujñātā mahataḥ sarvajñajñānasya kṣipramāhārakāḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_13: ye śrutvā codāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilapsyanta udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_23: durlabhā dharmadeśanā / durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpat / ākhyātā ca ajita mayā sarvakuśalamūlapāramitāprāptiḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_43_25: asya khalu punarajita dharmaparyāyasya mahatīṃ parīndanāṃ karomi /
S04bsu033_u:141_1: atha khalu punarbhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_49_0: na me akṛtapuṇyānāṃ śravā bheṣyanti īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_49_1: ye tu te śūra siddhārthāḥ śroṣyanti ca imāṃ giram //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_50_0: dṛṣṭo yaiśca hi saṃbuddho lokanāthaḥ prabhaṃkaraḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_50_1: sagauravaiḥ śruto dharmaḥ prītiṃ prāpsyanti te parām //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_51_0: na śakta hīnehi kusīdadṛṣṭibhiḥ buddhāna dharmeṣu prasāda vinditum /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_51_1: ye buddhakṣetreṣu akārṣi pūjāṃ trailokanāthāna caryāsu śikṣiṣu //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_52_0: yathāndhakāre puruṣo hyacakṣuḥ mārgaṃ na jāne kutu saṃprakāśayet /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_52_1: sarvaṃ tathā śrāvaka buddhajñāne ajānakāḥ kiṃ punaradya sattvāḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_53_0: buddho hi buddhasya guṇāṃ prajānate na devanāgāsurayakṣaśrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_53_1: anekabuddhāna pi no gatī yatho buddhasya jñāne hi prakāśyamāne //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_54_0: yadi sarvasattvāḥ samatā bhaveyuḥ viśuddhajñāne paramārthakovidāḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_54_1: te kalpakoṭīratha vāpi uttare naikasya buddhasya guṇān katheyuḥ //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_55_0: atrāntare nirvṛta te bhaveyuḥ prakāśamānā bahukalpakoṭīḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_55_1: na ca buddhajñānasya pramāṇu labhyate tathā hi jñānāścaryaṃ jinānām //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_56_0: tasmānnaraḥ paṇḍita vijñajātiyaḥ yo mahya vākyamabhiśraddadheya /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_56_1: kṛtsnāṃ sa sākṣājjinajñānamārgān buddhaḥ prajānaṃ ti girāmudīrayet //
S04bsu033_u:142_0: kadāci labhyati manuṣyalābhaḥ kadāci buddhāna pi prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_57_0: kadāci labhyati manuṣyalābhaḥ kadāci buddhāna pi prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_57_2: śraddhārthaprajñā sucireṇa labhyate tasyārthaprāptyai janayet vīryam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_58_0: ya īdṛśāṃ dharma śruṇitva śreṣṭhāṃ labhyanti prītiṃ sugataṃ smarantaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_vs_58_1: te mitramasmākamatītamadhvani ye cāpi bodhāya jananti chandam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_44_0: ya īdṛśāṃ dharma śruṇitva śreṣṭhāṃ labhyanti prītiṃ sugataṃ smarantaḥ /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_44_1: te mitramasmākamatītamadhvani ye cāpi bodhāya jananti chandam //
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_45_0: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānāṃ sattvaniyutakoṭīnāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_45_5: sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanakāmatayā /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_45_6: sarve ca te tatropapadya anupūrveṇa mañjusvarā nāma tathāgatā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣūpapatsyante /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_45_7: aśītiśca niyutakoṭyo dīpaṃkare tathāgate labdhakṣāntikā avaivartikā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheramitāyuṣaiva tathāgatena paripācitāḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ carantastāśca sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadya pūrvapraṇidhānacaryāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_46_2: pṛthivyāṃ saṃskṛtamabhūt / divyamānuṣyakāni ca tūryāṇi saṃpravāditānyabhūvan /
S04bsu033_u:sukhv_47_0: idamavocadbhagavānāttamanāḥ / ajito bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvasya loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S04bsu033_u:150_0: bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya sukhāvatīguṇavarṇaparikīrtanaṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartyabhūmipraveśaḥ amitābhasya parivartaḥ sukhāvatīvyūho mahāyānasūtraṃ samāptam /
S04bsu033_u:151_1: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu033_u:151_2: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
